name: Fallout 4 Guesser
description:
Figure out where you are in the world of Fallout 4 based on an image, and get a score out of 5000 based on how close you are.

Controls

Scroll to zoom, click and drag to pan. Click on the map to place your guess.

Please don't sue me, Todd

This is a fan made game. I am in no way related to Bethesda, who made and own Fallout 4. This is just for fun and I am not making money from it.

Credits

Bethesda, for making the original game
This guy, for posting the map I'm using
Emil, for testing and telling me how web things work
Me, for making the game and taking the in-game pictures
